fields.name: Get These Cucumbers Off Of My Face
fields.description: A heartwarming adventure, that will test the friendship of three best friends. In an alternate timeline, a masseuse, a hairdresser and a bank teller go on a crime spree.

fields.name: The Thing: The 3D Experience
fields.description: Prepare yourself for the ultimate in 3D entertainment. Special visual effects take you into the world of everyone's favorite ball of hair!

fields.name: It Pays To Buy Good Tea
fields.description: From world-renownd British playwright, Gerrard Tea'n'Crumpets comes another amazing adaptation on the events of the infamous Boston Teaparty.

fields.name: Sasquatch
fields.description: The sobering tale of the World's Most Ridiculously Hairy Man. A musical adaptation.

fields.name: Your Mom: The Saga Continues
fields.description: A touching tale of intrigue and passion.

fields.name: Honey I Built A World-Dominating Robot
fields.description: A quirky family comedy about a lovable android named Norman and his lust for power.

fields.name: True Stories: The Ballmer Peak
fields.description: A panel with the world's foremost computer scientists where they uncover the mysteries of drinking while coding.

fields.name: Salsa Dancing On Ice
fields.description: A special one-weekend salsa skating extravagnza!

fields.name: Marvin's Marvelous Cucumber Grab Bag
fields.description: So you can recreate the heartwarming occurances of 'Get These Cucumbers Off Of My Face', we're offering a special limited time grab bag of assorted cucumbers! Comes in a decorative burlap sack.

fields.name: Box of Tissues
fields.description: Weepy tissues for the emotional moments of Sasquatch
